pages.text: Plants are unpredictable and exciting, but sometimes you don't want that. Too many times can a neglected patch of vines consume your abode. The solution is simple: halt the plant's growth cycle. The Dust of Wilting does just that, placing affected plants in a stasis of sorts, not dead, but not growing.
As it turns out, this has a multitude of uses, and many decorative paths reveal themselves when you hold the targeted power to seemingly freeze time.
